settings.title: Fiber Facts
settings.content:
WHY FIBER?

Because fiber is the Swiss Army knife of supplements—it can do it all. From regulating your poop and relieving bloating to keeping your heart healthy, there are tons of benefits to taking the recommended amount of fiber daily,* but 95% of Americans don’t. We want better for you.

HOW DO I USE BELLWAY FIBER?

Take it 1-3 times per day, dissolving 1 serving of powder into at least 8 oz. of water—make sure it’s not too cold, or else the powder won’t blend as well. (Taking without enough water may cause choking. Do not take if you have difficulty swallowing.) Mix well and enjoy right away!

CAN I TAKE FIBER IF I’M ON MEDICATION?

Yup! Be sure to take Bellway at least 2 hours before or after taking medicine, though, since fiber can interfere with medicine absorption.

DOES IT HAVE ANY SIDE EFFECTS?

You may experience some minor bloating with the first few servings because your body needs time to get used to the increased fiber intake. Our advice is to take it easy. Start with 1 serving a day and gradually increase to no more than 3 servings daily.

WHERE IS BELLWAY PRODUCED?

Bellway is produced in the U.S.A.

settings.title: psyllium husk
settings.content:
WHAT IS IT?

Here’s some info to impress your friends with. Psyllium husk is a type of fiber made from the seeds of a plant called Plantago ovata. Due to its special gelling properties, it’s often used as a fiber supplement to help regulate digestion and bowel movements. Unlike other fibers, it doesn’t ferment in your gut and make you gassy, which definitely feels as uncomfortable as it sounds.*

HOW DOES IT WORK?

When psyllium is mixed with water, it turns into a gel-like substance. This works as a bulking agent in your digestive tract, absorbing water and icky stuff to create stool that soft and easy to pass, just how you like it. That’s why psyllium is so effective against constipation, diarrhea, hemorrhoids, and tons of other digestive conditions.

settings.title: subscriptions
settings.content:
WHY SUBSCRIBE?

It just makes life easier. You get the most out of fiber by taking it daily, and a subscription ensures that you never run out. (And that you pay less. Just saying.)

HOW MUCH IS IT?

Just $29.99 a month, or $0.53 a serving. We did the math.

WHEN DO I GET CHARGED?

Once a month, on the day of your initial purchase. That’s about 1 week before your subscription order ships.

CAN I CHANGE MY SUBSCRIPTION?

Sure can! Head over to your account page to make adjustments to your subscription.

CAN I CANCEL MY SUBSCRIPTION?

Cancel anytime by going to your account page or emailing us at hello@getbellway.com. Be sure to cancel before we process your monthly payment!

settings.title: shipping
settings.content:
HOW DO I TRACK MY ORDER?

Check your email! We'll send you a shipping confirmation with tracking information as soon as your order is processed.

WHERE DOES BELLWAY SHIP?

We currently ship to the Continental U.S.

WHEN WILL IT SHIP?

We work hard to ship all orders within 24 hours, but please allow up to 3 business days for your order to be shipped. You know, just in case.

I HAVEN'T RECEIVED MY ORDER YET

Oh no! Send us an email at hello@getbellway.com and we'll help.

settings.title: FSA/hsa
settings.content:
CAN I USE MY FSA OR HSA DOLLARS?

Yes, you can use your flexible spending account dollars to purchase all Bellway products. Just use your FSA/HSA card like you would your credit card at checkout.

Important to know: reimbursements are determined by individual insurance plans/provider. While all Bellway products are eligible, your insurance provider has final say in whether you will be reimbursed. Bellway does not have control over what insurance providers deem as eligible for reimbursement.

settings.heading: How does it work?
settings.text: Psyllium is a natural fiber that gently travels through your system absorbing loose materials, trapping toxins and improving digestion. Once it’s reached the end of its journey, it exits smooth and easy, leaving you with only good gut feelings.

settings.heading: Do You Get Enough Fiber?
settings.text:
95% of people don’t even come close to getting the doctor recommended 30 grams of fiber a day… which makes sense considering you’d need to eat 3 pounds of baby spinach, 8 cups of blueberries, or 10 bananas to get that 30g of fiber. Ain’t nobody got time for that! 

One serving of Bellway gets you 18% your daily recommended fiber.
Pour 1-2 rounded teaspoons into empty glass
Add at least 8 oz of cool liquid
Mix well
Drink right away and enjoy!
